itemDescription: English clergyman, Biblical scholar, traveller and ornithologist (1822-1906)

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Baker Tristram FRS (11 May 1822 – 8 March 1906) was an English clergyman, Bible scholar, traveller and ornithologist. As a parson-naturalist he was an early supporter of Darwinism, attempting to reconcile evolution and creation.
